trans-unit.source: Defines methods and properties for writing a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Define os métodos e propriedades para escrever um <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A writer for outputting the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um escritor para exportar a nova <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For example, the `imageType` might be <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType>.
The image type of the thumbnail to add.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de imagem da miniatura para adicionar.
Esvaziamentos da e fecha o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> </xref> escritor.

trans-unit.source: Gets the zero-based position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a posição baseado em zero do <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> </xref> no <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"> </xref>.
A propriedade de DocumentNumber é baseado em zero.

trans-unit.source: A DocumentNumber value of zero (0) indicates the first the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> in the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de DocumentNumber de zero (0) indica que o primeiro <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>na <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A posição baseado em zero do <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> </xref> no <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets default print options for the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Define as opções de impressão para a predefinição de <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property does not validate or modify the specified <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade não validar ou modificar a especificado <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>para um determinado <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: If needed, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specific <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is valid for a given printer.
trans-unit.target: Se necessário, utilize o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>método para criar um <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-específico <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>que é válido para uma impressora indicada.</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>
